title: Centralia, Pennsylvania
summary: Centralia is a borough and near-ghost town in Columbia County, Pennsylvania, United States. Its population has declined from  1,000 in 1980 to 5 residents in 2017[8] because a coal mine fire has been burning beneath the borough since 1962.
